# NTX

NTX is a modern, real-time explorer and analytics platform for the Nepal Stock Exchange (NEPSE).
It offers detailed insights into market trends, company performance, and trading activities.

## Features

- **Real-time Data**: Live market status, indices, and stock prices.
- **Company Analysis**: Comprehensive profiles, dividends, and financial reports.
- **Market Depth**: Visual representation of buy/sell orders.
- **Floorsheet**: Live trading flow and broker analysis.

## Key Pages

- [Home](https://ntx.anishshrestha.com/)
- [Company List](https://ntx.anishshrestha.com/company)
- [Largest Market Cap](https://ntx.anishshrestha.com/market-cap)
- [Mutual Funds](https://ntx.anishshrestha.com/mutual-funds)
